title: How Mom knew Dad was the right guy to marry
description: From the full video of Mom’s testimony https://youtu.be/W6xJKjPmEzo

transcript_parts.text: and after probably a year of reading and
just
not feeling like I was getting a lot out
of it I read something that seemed
personal to me
or I read it and I took as a reaction
this could be personal to me I could
have this kind of direction from God
like I'm reading about
and since he's sitting next to me I'll
share you share with you what that was
it was a story in the scripture of where
Abraham
sent out his servant to get a bride for
his son
and when I read that I thought God can I
do that could I ask you for that could I
not have to date around like I see
people doing and end up for heartbreak
after heartbreak so I asked him for that
well funny thing is shortly thereafter
a fellow from the church I went to asked
me out and I thought yeah I don't really
like him but I did ask for a prayer
you know okay whatever you can well he
wasn't the one
um when I met your dad I didn't know he
was the one either we were friends for a
long time and then one day he asked me
to go out and I said yes and then I
realized oh he asked me to go out
and so we went out
and um I share with him that night
that I had asked God but I had asked God
and that I thought he was the answer now
that should have scared anybody away but
he said oh okay and uh within a couple
weeks he'd had the kind of the same
message this is off track of what I was
going to say okay let me let me consult
my notes it is an important part of the
story though
I was very surprised and she said yes
um
